title: 10 RP short of Academy Ahri
body: I logged into league today and saw that Academy Ahri was in store. I became so excited that I instantly went to buy it and found out I was 10 RP short. I then realized, maybe if I drew Academy Ahri, Riot would be pleased to give me 10 RP to get this beautiful skin. Will keep you updated.

replies.body: That is hideous but worth 10 RP
It's beautiful.
Correction....beautiful mini skirt...I'm not one of those people but that's one of the few redeeming qualities.
Oh why thank you, although the arm/hand to the right is the most exquisite part of this drawling in my opinion.
Kill it with fire.
As an Ahri main, I am getting mixed feelings about this.....**drawing**.
All Ahris are beautiful!
Typing this with one hand...
lmao
put in a support ticket requesting it
I did, but I want to show my artistic skills to everyone.
Oh my. This is... truly magnificent...
